title: Hey Arnold
admin_review: I loved the acting in this movie. It was absolutely sublime!

episodes.title: Downtown as Fruits
episodes.description: Arnold and Gerald perform in a play about fruits, but Helga takes her role too seriously.

episodes.title: Eugene’s Bike
episodes.description: Arnold accidentally destroys Eugene’s new bike and tries to make it up to him.

title: Rugrats
admin_review: I loved the acting in this movie. It was absolutely sublime!

episodes.title: Barbeque Story
episodes.description: At a family barbecue, Tommy escapes his playpen to sample some real food, leading to chaos in the backyard.

episodes.title: Waiter, There's a Baby in My Soup
episodes.description: Stu and Didi take Tommy to an elegant restaurant, but the babies’ curiosity turns dinner into disaster.

title: Dilbert
admin_review: A sharp, witty take on corporate culture — the perfect adaptation of Scott Adams’ satirical comic strip.

episodes.title: The Name
episodes.description: Dilbert tries to create a new product for his company, but chaos ensues when management decides to let marketing pick the name.

episodes.title: The Prototype
episodes.description: Dilbert and his team struggle to build a prototype for their new product while the company’s bureaucracy spirals out of control.

title: Winx Club
admin_review: Colorful, magical, and full of heart — a timeless mix of friendship, fantasy, and fashion that defined early 2000s animation.

episodes.title: It Feels Like Magic
episodes.description: Bloom, an ordinary Earth girl, discovers she has magical powers when she saves Stella, a fairy princess from Solaria, from an ogre attack.

episodes.title: Welcome to Magix!
episodes.description: After discovering her powers, Bloom travels with Stella to the magical realm of Magix and enrolls at Alfea, the college for fairies.
